reviews.review: Blue portal Orange Portal.... you get it
Love this game equally for the ingenuity of the puzzles and obstacles, and for the snarky clever dialog.  SO much fun.  About to start playing coop mode.
Nuff' said, this game is amazing. Sadly we will not see a 3rd installment :(

There is a white substance in this game 

Epic

This game was one of the first, if no the first, puzzle games I had ever played. As a kid I remember getting so frustrated at all the challenging puzzles and giving up multiple times. However, I always came back to try and finish. THAT is how you know you have made a brilliant puzzle game. This game has so much environmental storytelling its insane, Valve truly made a work of art with this one. For anyone who wants a fun yet challenging puzzle game with more than just gameplay but a real story, I highly recommend this game.
игра супер, но все еще не могу найти корабль Борей в ангаре

Fun and entertaining game. The puzzles can be challenging but are overall pretty easy which makes the game enjoyable even if you are not into this type. The game also has a pretty good co-op mode where you can play with one friend. Its only negative aspect is to be a bit short but it's absolutely worth the price and you will definitley enjoy it. Good job Gaben and Valve.
Portal 2 is a gem of a game. Fantastic writing, a stunning ost, and head scratching puzzles.
I love this game so so so sooo much!! ♥

Algo en que al menos el 80% de la comunidad concuerda es que este juego es una obra maestra (refiriendome a la franquicia entera ya que algunos piensan que el dos no es tan bueno como el uno, yo creo que los dos son igual de buenos). 
Cuando este escribiendo esta reseña no me habré terminado el juego, voy mas o menos por la mitad de la historia ya que soy alguien que se toma muchísima calma para terminar un juego, eso es una de las cosas de porque me gusta tanto portal, a veces puede frustrarte un puzzle pero la cuestión es que es una experiencia rápida, que no te apura en ningún momento y sobre todo, en la cual absolutamente nada sobra, cosas que parecen triviales como la distancia que tiene un objeto con otro o la ubicación de los paneles negros y blancos hacen que puedas relajarte jugando mientras el juego te tira hacia donde quiere para lograr una mejor experiencia, y esto sería algo malo si no fuera por el tipo de juego que es Portal, por ejemplo Dark Souls es un increible juego por todo lo contrario, el juego no te arrastra de un lugar a otro sino que te deja que explores el mundo y descubras tú cual es el mejor lado para ir, es curioso como me gustan los dos juegos por cosas totalmente opuestas, pero es que los recursos que uses son irrelevantes mientras los uses correctamente.
一弹二加速，两大特色。相当经典游戏

Simmons) A Interesting man he built curtains into science, wow what the wonderland, now heres me thinking this is a game about burning peoples houses down with the lemons, however no no NO! its not, it is game in which the protagonist, William Afton, Must escape certain death by killing the Joker A.K.A GLADOS(G.L.A.D.O.S.) A scary robot who doesn't like humans so "They/Them" Kills like 80 or something, and it goes very well because a robot designed to have severe down syndrome helps you take her down, but then he gets power hungry and punches you down a tunnel to wear cavey johhny lives(Alberquerque) But Cave is dead so he is of no help, really to bad. game ends there 2/10

simplemente valve... 

Perfecto para el coronavirus y el confinamiento con amigos
The singleplayer is great. The coop is phenomenal. One of my top games of all time.

Previous to this game I did not consider it possible for, what is basically a puzzle solving game to have a great story with characters that you will remember for a long time.
The game builds perfectly on portal 1. Expanding on it just enough while introducing new characters and story elements that will keep you for "1 more level". 
Certainly not the longest game ever and I completed it in a couple of plays. I was so intent on seeing how the story progressed that I did rush it somewhat.
Stephen Merchant played wheatley to perfection. He will have you laughing on more than one occasion throughout the game.

I have recently discovered the co-op content too which is also very enjoyable and has some pretty funny quips from GLaDOS.

100% buy this game on sale. Even at full price if you like the series.
